components.name: Frontend
components.description: A Single Page Application (SPA) developed using React and TypeScript, providing a user-friendly interface for online shopping.

components.name: User Service
components.description: Manages user authentication, profiles, and session management.

components.name: Product Service
components.description: Handles the catalog and inventory of products, providing product information to the frontend.

components.name: Order Service
components.description: Responsible for processing and fulfilling customer orders, interacting with the Order Database.

components.name: Payment Service
components.description: Integrates with payment gateways like Stripe for secure transaction processing.

data_flows.description: User authentication requests are sent from the frontend to the User Service.
Product information requests are sent from the frontend to the Product Service.
Order placement requests are sent from the frontend to the Order Service.
Payment processing requests are sent from the Order Service to the Payment Service.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary separating user data management from other services to protect sensitive information.

trust_boundaries.name: Payment Processing Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that isolates payment processing to ensure secure handling of financial transactions.
